description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis- Get Rid Of Your Depression Now Using Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn-

  • About depression – How depression starts?
  • Find out the reasons why people suffer from depression
  • What happens when you are depressed – how your self-talk and body language changes?
You will be able to overcome depression which is caused due to stress, lack of confidence , negative thoughts , addictions, negative past , broken relationships etc using powerful self hypnosis techniques like affirmations , mind triggers, relaxation techniques and by asking positive questions to your selfThis course consists of more than 30 minutes of video content , audio file and positive affirmation handout designed over 10 lecturesThis course contains

Lecture1: Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Change Your Internal Dialogue

Lecture7:Affirmations To Overcome Depression

Lecture8:Change Your Body Posture To Change Your State Of Mind

Lecture9:Audio File

Lecture 10: Summary
title: Hypnosis- Get Rid Of Your Depression Now Using Self Hypnosis
